traits.Keen Smell: The badger has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

actions.Multiattack: The badger makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +3+1d4 + 1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.
actions.Claws: Melee Weapon Attack: +3+1d4 + 1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (2d4 + 1) slashing damage.
